modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description:

- Corrected HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=yes">

Explanation:
The incorrect HTML had the attribute "user-scalable=no" which disables zooming on mobile devices. To fix this accessibility violation, the "user-scalable=no" attribute has been changed to "user-scalable=yes". This allows users to zoom in and out on the webpage using their mobile devices, ensuring better accessibility for users who may need to enlarge the content.
